reviews.review_text: inside cloth lining of t product was in torn condition. all threads coming out. main zip stiching was also in bad shape. large threads coming out. Some black spots seen on face of t purse outer part.otherwise t product looked as per website and was ok.

reviews.review_header: Large for a hand bag size..
reviews.review_text: I like bag.. but it is slightly bulky and bit large for my taste.Hence returning it... no issue with design or quality.The product I received was in good condition.Make sure you double check dimensions before ordering.
The workmanship is not good. Finishing in the interior of the bag is poor. The zip catches the cloth and the threads on the very first day. What will happen after some use?
Item as described. My wife loves it.

Very poori have purchased from amzon earliar alsobut this time1. Quality og the bag- very poor2. Colour - faded & poor & not like it seems in ad.3 Delivery time :- not as promised. Lateoverall not a value for my money and not attractive in actualdissattisfied. :-(
